metadata.title: CVE-2021-47298 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: bpf,sockmap: Fix potential memory leak on unlikely error case If skb_linearizeis needed and fails we could leak a msg on the error handling. To fixensure we kfree the msg block before returning error. Found during codereview.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
